scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two women in an interior setting. On the left, a woman in a black habit and white veil kneels with her hands clasped in prayer. She wears a fur-lined mantle and a rosary with a pendant. On the right, a woman richly dressed in an orange gown with red sleeves and a black headdress sits on a raised dais. She holds a decorative blue and white lidded vessel. Behind her is a green tiled wall and a wooden canopy. To the left, an arched opening reveals an outdoor landscape with rolling green hills, a blue sky, and some rudimentary buildings. A peacock stands on the floor in the foreground.
